mapper.insert: insert into spring_member(member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_phone) values(#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_phone})
mapper.select: select count(*) as member_auth, member_grade from spring_member where member_id=#{member_id} and member_pw=#{member_pw}
select member_id, member_name, member_pw, member_phone from spring_member where member_id=#{member_id}
select count(*) from spring_member where member_id=#{member_id}
